TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PropertyInformation extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains meta-information on an individual property within the configuration. This type cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation> object contains the meta-information of an individual property within the configuration. This object can be used when validating and changing the properties of an individual attribute.
The <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation> object is derived from the associated <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection> object. The <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection> object is derived from the associated <xref:System.Configuration.ElementInformation> object.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation> type.
[!code-csharp[System.Configuration.PropertyInformation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.PropertyInformation/CS/PropertyInformation.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.PropertyInformation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.PropertyInformation/VB/PropertyInformation.vb#1)]

public: property System::ComponentModel::TypeConverter ^ Converter { System::ComponentModel::TypeConverter ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the object related to the configuration attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> object is used to guide how the value of an attribute can be modified.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsLocked As Boolean
public: property bool IsLocked { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value specifying whether the configuration attribute is locked.
Docs.value: if the object is locked; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Configuration.PropertyInformation.IsLocked%2A> property returns `true` when the related element is locked by the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockAttributes%2A> or <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockAllAttributesExcept%2A> property.

public: property int LineNumber { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the line number in the configuration file related to the configuration attribute.
Docs.value: A line number of the configuration file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The line number associated with the source configuration file. Zero is returned when there is no source configuration file.
